title: Anker Zolo Magnetic Wireless Charger, Qi2 Certified 15W MagSafe-Compatible Wireless Charging Pad, for iPhone 16/15/14/13 Series, AirPods, and More (Adapter Not Included) (Black, 2 Pack) 2 pack Black
description: Rapid 15W Wireless Charging: Unlock 15W high-speed charging with Qi2 certification and power your iPhone 16 Pro Max to 20% in just 19 minutes. For the best fast charging experience, we recommend using a 20W or higher output charger (not included).

top_reviews.title: Works with the S25 Edge at full "Fast Wireless Charging" Speed of 15 Watts
top_reviews.body: I bought this because even though the Apple Magsafe Gen 2 charger (braided cable one) says its Qi2 certified, it ONLY slow charged my S25 Edge at 7.5-10 Watts! While even my Qi2 car charger charged at full 15 Watt speed. At first I was concerned that the base wasn't as flat as the apple one (Hence I bought the apple one first). But in actual use, the phone didn't wobble as I thought it would while charging. Been using Anker products for 10+ years now. Other than an Anker branded desk lamp, none of the 40+ products I bought from them hasn't let me down even to this day. To any S25 users wondering, while using this charger the lock screen show "Fast Wireless charging" meaning its charging at the designed 15 Watts. I recommend using a USB-C charger brick that is 20 Watts or more. Read more
